channel.title: Wavelength: helping people hear each other on Wavelength
channel.description: Recent content in Wavelength: helping people hear each other on Wavelength

item.title: Welcome to Kube
item.description: Welcome to Kube – an open source documentation like theme for Hugo Hi there and welcome to kube - my two theme for the static site generator hugo. kube is open source and can be found on kube. This article is just a demo post and shows you the style of common used elements. Bear claw danish chocolate lollipop soufflé jelly. Apple pie chocolate cake jelly-o icing bonbon. Gingerbread pastry fruitcake muffin chocolate bar cheesecake.

item.title: Onboarding Questions
item.description: .section-head:after { content: ''; } ul.checklist { padding: 20px; background: rgba(143, 188, 143, 0.50); border-radius: 6px; list-style: none;" } ul.checklist li:before { content: '✓'; } Onboarding questions I am a _____ (age) _______ (gender) in ___________. And I love _________? What do you love about ______{topic}? If you won $10,000, what's the first thing you would spend money on? Do you say pop or soda? Manhattan clam chowder or New England clam chowder?

item.title: Conversation Guidelines
item.description: .section-head:after { content: ''; } ul.checklist { padding: 20px; background: rgba(143, 188, 143, 0.50); border-radius: 6px; list-style: none;" } ul.checklist li:before { content: '✓'; } A guide to more fully engaged conversations Wait: Let the other person speak fully before asking questions. Try not to formulate a response before they finish. Assume positive intentions: Assume that the other person has good intentions. Use “I” statements: Use "I" statements to keep the discussion based on your personal experience, rather than pointing fingers.

item.title: Welcome Page
item.description: .section-head:after { content: ''; } ul.checklist { padding: 20px; background: rgba(143, 188, 143, 0.50); border-radius: 6px; list-style: none;" } ul.checklist li:before { content: '✓'; } Questions of the Day Should recreational marijuana be legalized? [RESPOND / RECORD BUTTON] Are young people better off than previous generations because of the Internet? [RESPOND / RECORD BUTTON] Should hospitals be allowed to force employees to get flu shots? [RESPOND / RECORD BUTTON] Record a response:

item.title: Typography with kube
item.description: Get Started Typography of Kube based on the 4px horizontal grid, it means that for the headers, paragraphs, quotes and any other texts chosen are a combination of line-height, that fit into the 4px grid and help set the horizontal rhythm of design by default. 4px grid for typography - the magic of the horizontal rhythm With this feature, you can quickly and easily make a solid and harmonious-looking website and UI design.

item.title: Prototyping with markdown
item.description: I have been working on a large set of documentation for a prototype that will eventually make it into a product. One issue with the publishing system at my company is that it makes doing prototypes, or really anything not within the rigidly and narrowly scoped model, difficult to set up. It takes a lot of work just to get to the point where you can begin writing. Since time was of the essence and writing is expensive, I decided to do the prototype outside of the publishing system.

item.title: Initial Match
item.description: .section-head:after { content: ''; } ul.checklist { padding: 20px; background: rgba(143, 188, 143, 0.50); border-radius: 6px; list-style: none;" } ul.checklist li:before { content: '✓'; } Andrew, you have a match! Sandi agrees with you on a lot of things: a hot dog is a sandwich You both consider yourselves "observant" You call yourselves "news junkie" You both call carbonated beverages "soda" But: You disagree about the following: Are young people today better off because of the internet, or worse?

item.title: Your Dashboard
item.description:
Questions of the Day: input[type=range]:before { content: 'No Way!'; color: #ff3366; } input[type=range]:after { content: 'Absolutely!'; color: green; } .record { flex: 2; margin-left: 24px; background-color:#ffbc00; border:5px solid #5f6d7a; height:120px; border-radius:50%; max-width:120px; cursor: pointer; } .record-small { flex: 2; margin-left: 24px; background-color:#ffbc00; border:5px solid #5f6d7a; height:60px; border-radius:50%; max-width:60px; cursor: pointer; } Should recreational marijuana be legalized?
In the wake of FBI Director James Comey’s firing, should Congress appoint someone independent to investigate alleged ties between Russia and the Trump administration?

item.title: Messages
item.description: Usage You have 2 modules waiting to installation. Install <div class=“message” data-component=“message”> … <span class=“close small”></span></div> You have 2 modules waiting to installation. Install <div class=“message error” data-component=“message”> … <span class=“close small”></span></div> You have 2 modules waiting to installation. Install <div class=“message success” data-component=“message”> … <span class=“close small”></span></div> Warning!You have 2 modules waiting to installation. Install <div class=“message warning” data-component=“message”> <h5>…</h5> … <span class=“close small”></span> </div> You have 2 modules waiting to installation.

item.title: Sign In
item.description: Email Password Log in Forgot password? If you have any questions about authorization or you're our customer but haven't receive your login credentials, just send us a short email at support@wavelengthradio.com and we'll fix it right away.
